name: Tomato Jones - Episode 3
description: Tomato Jones - Episode 3 is a physics based ball-rolling platformer. The third sequel of its greatly fun predecessors - "Tomato Jones" and "Tomato Jones 2", already available on Steam.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550Ti or ATI analog - with 1 GB RAM or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 750 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX9.0c
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i3 / i5 series or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550Ti or ATI analog - with 1 GB RAM or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 750 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX9.0c
